entry.title: LARK PANTS
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leostar Athletic Wear
Type: Pants
Price: 60.00

Lark is a staple for any wardrobe. Mid-rise to sit right on the waist and full length to the ankle. Wear for fitness or travel or leisure. Tapered leg for flattering length and wide waistband ensures comfort and casual fit. Invisible zippered pockets ensure discreet security for all pocketed items.   

Model is 5'8/175cm with a 27" waist, wearing a size Small

Imported

Product Detail:
Tapered leg. Two invisible zip pockets. Elastic waistband. Full length. Casual fit.  

Nylon Supplex and Spandex
Four-way stretch
Breathable fabric
Moisture-wicking
Supplex (UPF 40 Sun Protection)*
Scotchgard 3M (Moisture Management)
Cling and Pill Resistant/Shape Retention

[Best washed inside out in cold water. Hang dry or tumble dry on a low setting.]

entry.title: MAY BAMBOO FLEECE JOGGER(ULTRA-THICK)
entry.summary:
Vendor: J76 Bamboo Wear
Type: Bamboo Wear
Price: 79.00

May is made to to lounge and travels well whether it be from the studio to the street. Tapered leg design with convenient side pockets and elastic waistband plus drawstring waist. Full length to the ankle. Cuffed ankle makes the pant leg length adjustable. Wear it high or low for different looks. Relaxed fit. 

Model is 5'5/165cm with a 27" waist, inseam 27.5" wearing a size S.

MADE IN VANCOUVER, B.C. CANADA

Product Detail:

Classic sweat pants. Full length. Dual front pockets. Wide waistband. Lined with bamboo fleece material and thicker than bamboo cotton. Relaxed fit. Inseam approximately 28.5 inches

Rayon from Bamboo, Cotton and Spandex
Soft and luxurious 
Breathable fabric
Naturally antibacterial
Moisture-wicking
Cling and pill resistant
Long lasting wear

[Best washed inside out in cold water. Hang dry or tumble dry on low setting.]

entry.title: AMANDA WAIST TRAINER LEGGING
entry.summary:
Vendor: J76 Bamboo Wear
Type: Legging
Price: 60.00

Amanda is a waist trainer - slims the tummy and controls the waistline while you work out. It is designed with adjustable rows of hook eye closures for waist compression and helps tuck the tummy to help achieve a smaller waist. Made of highly elastic fabric that is strong but still soft and breathable. Meant to enhance work outs and physical activities and great for post-partum wear. Ultra high waist and unique waist design to help flatten and reshape with its sleek design. 

The model is 170cm with a 28" waist, wearing a size Medium.

Imported

Product Detail:
Ultra-High Waist. Full length. Tight fit and side seam. Inseam approximately 26 inches

Nylon Supplex & Spandex Fabric
Four-way stretch
Breathable fabric
Moisture-wicking
Supplex (UPF Sun Protection)*
Scotchgard 3M (Moisture Management)
Cling and Pill Resistant/Shape Retention

[Best washed inside out in cold water. Hang dry or tumble dry on a low setting.]
